name: Universidade de Santiago de Compostela
description: Maintaining an academic tradition of more than 500 years, the University of Santiago de Compostela aims to provide students with high-quality learning and research. These high standards also extend to its different services as well as to its social and environmental needs. Organised into two campus, one located in Lugo and the other in Compostela, the USC ranges over the whole five areas of kwnoledge: Experimental Science, Health Science, Social and Legal Science, Technical Science and Humanities. Moreover, the USC is an institution that shows an intense research activity, developed by its 72 departments, 18 research institutes and by more than 1600 researchers, all of them coordinated by the Innovation and Technological Transfer Centre (CITT).
